languages.text: {n}Тишина в ответ — и внезапно потусторонность окружающей вас темноты сменяется чем-то иным. Чем-то прозаичным. Шаги, рядом с вами. Шепот:{/n} "Я здесь. Не шевелись. Сейчас я сниму швы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Тишина в ответ — и внезапно потусторонность окружающей вас темноты сменяется чем-то иным. Чем-то прозаичным. Шаги, рядом с вами. Шепот:{/n} "Я здесь. Не шевелись. Сейчас я сниму швы. Кан'Шин оказался бессилен..."

languages.text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."
languages.original_text: {n}Тишина в ответ — и внезапно потусторонность окружающей вас темноты сменяется чем-то иным. Чем-то прозаичным. Шаги, рядом с вами. Шепот:{/n} "Я здесь. Не шевелись. Сейчас я сниму швы".

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the surrounding ethereality is replaced by something else. Something normal. You hear footsteps approaching. Then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

{n}You hear silence... and suddenly the surrounding ethereality is replaced by something else. Something normal. You hear footsteps approaching. Then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

{n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

{n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

{n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

{n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

languages.text: {n}Du hörst Schweigen ... und plötzlich weicht die ätherische Stille um dich herum etwas anderem, etwas Normalem. Du hörst Schritte, die sich nähern, dann ein Flüstern:{/n} "Ich bin hier. Bewegt Euch nicht. Ich nehme Euch das ab."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst Schweigen ... und plötzlich weicht die ätherische Stille um dich herum etwas anderem, etwas Normalem. Du hörst Schritte, die sich nähern, dann ein Flüstern:{/n} "Ich bin hier. Bewegt Euch nicht. Ich nehme Euch das ab."

languages.text: {n}Oyes silencio... y, de repente, la atmósfera etérea que te rodea queda sustituida por algo distinto, algo normal. Oyes pasos que se acercan seguidos de un susurro:{/n} «Estoy aquí. No se mueva. Deje que le quite eso».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes silencio... y, de repente, la atmósfera etérea que te rodea queda sustituida por algo distinto, algo normal. Oyes pasos que se acercan seguidos de un susurro:{/n} «Estoy aquí. No se mueva. Deje que le quite eso».

languages.text: {n}沈黙が聞こえ…唐突に、周囲の幽玄さが何か別のもの、普通のものに変わる。近づいてくる足音を、続いて囁きをあなたは聞く。{/n}「私はここよ。動かないで。外してあげる」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

traits.locale_text: {n}沈黙が聞こえ…唐突に、周囲の幽玄さが何か別のもの、普通のものに変わる。近づいてくる足音を、続いて囁きをあなたは聞く。{/n}「私はここよ。動かないで。外してあげる」

languages.text: {n}你只听到了一片寂静……突然之间，你周围虚无缥缈的感觉被别的什么东西取代了，某些正常的东西。你听到脚步声向你靠近，随后传来了低语声。{/n}“我就在这里。不要动，我来替你拆线。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

traits.locale_text: {n}你只听到了一片寂静……突然之间，你周围虚无缥缈的感觉被别的什么东西取代了，某些正常的东西。你听到脚步声向你靠近，随后传来了低语声。{/n}“我就在这里。不要动，我来替你拆线。”

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez le silence... et soudain, l'étheréalité qui vous entoure est remplacée par autre chose. Quelque chose d'anormal. Des pas approchent, puis un murmure :{/n} « Je suis là. Ne bougez pas. Je vais vous enlever ça. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez le silence... et soudain, l'étheréalité qui vous entoure est remplacée par autre chose. Quelque chose d'anormal. Des pas approchent, puis un murmure :{/n} « Je suis là. Ne bougez pas. Je vais vous enlever ça. »

languages.text: {n}Yalnızca sessizlik duyuyorsun ve... Aniden etrafını saran eteriyetin yerini başka bir şey, daha normal bir şey alıyor. Yaklaşan ayak sesleri ve ardından bir fısıltı duyuyorsun.{/n} "Buradayım. Hareket etme. Müsaadenle şunları çıkarayım."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear silence... and suddenly the ethereality around you is replaced by something else, something normal. You hear footsteps approaching, then a whisper:{/n} "I'm here. Don't move. Let me take those off."
